mapper.select: select * from chatRoom order by reg_date DESC limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum};
select roomMember from chatRoom where roomNo = #{roomNo};
mapper.update: update chatRoom set roomMember = #{members} where roomNo = ${roomNo};
